headline: June 2025 Monthly Release
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., July 17, 2025--The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) today announced estimated catastrophe losses for the month of June of $619 million or $489 million, after-tax. Catastrophe losses for June include 15 events with approximately 70% of the losses related to three wind and hail events. Total catastrophe losses for the second quarter of 2025 were $1.99 billion or $1.57 billion, after-tax.

headline: Pricing, Tariffs, Social Inflation To Top U.S. P&C Earnings Agendas
summary: A changing pricing environment and renewed social inflation worries will be among the focal points for US property and casualty insurers when they release second quarter results.

raw.headline: Pricing, Tariffs, Social Inflation To Top U.S. P&C Earnings Agendas
